html:
6.3.19  12:07 pm   how many questions do you get

     [tommy lee jones voice] a couple

6.3.19  10:36 am   can you voice a C6/#6/b7/7/b9/9/#9/11/#11/b13 to be useful

     sure

6.3.19  9:03 am   is area 51 real?

     all the areas are real, except 13. it goes straight to 14. which actually if you think about it means 14 is secretly 13, and so on, every one after that would be displaced to the next number. so therefore one of the ones higher than 13 must be fake but no one can entirely be sure. so that means i just realized 51 could actually be the fake one

6.3.19  8:51 am   im trying to learn bass but i just like, cant get myself to actually play it and i feel like i know nothing,, any help?

     you must play along with songs, with the bass removed. this can be easily done with a smartphone, laptop, or tablet. just play a regular recording of the song through the tablet (no headphones, just through the tiny tablet speakers. this automatically removes the bass) then make sure your bass is plugged into a bass amplification source (bass amp, etc) and then just figure out how to make the song work. pretend you are in church and someone hired you by accident and now you have to make the song feel great for the crowd right now or else get sent to confessional

6.3.19  8:00 am   I'm guessing further forays into 3d animation is your new hottest new hot feeling. Care to share any breakthroughs or interesting tests you've done for us loyal fans?

     sure

6.3.19  7:39 am   What is your opinion on cats?

     they are somewhat meowsome

6.3.19  5:45 am   does your next video involve stop motion?

     more like start motion

6.3.19  3:20 am   why are you not uploading?

     this is the part where i make the thing that gets uploaded. important, otherwise thing doesn't exist

6.3.19  3:19 am   do u like memes

     only cream memes

6.3.19  2:47 am   how many bees?

     ∞

6.3.19  2:12 am   Is it? Or is it really not? 

     could be

6.3.19  12:06 am   i think there's two elements of enjoyment of music: there's a basic response to individual sounds (be it instruments, snippets of voice, or any sort of sound in the song) and some sort of long-term enjoyment based on structure, tonal shifts, tension and anticipation. as someone who makes music you are much more qualified to speculate on this than i am. how do you think enjoying music works?

     it's really just like the Turing test. 2 souls take the test. Each one will be thrilled if they are able to present the other with a passing grade. it's not entirely even clear who's testing whom at this point

6.2.19  11:41 pm   i feel like i visit this website too little. what can i do about this?

     start by discovering 1 thing on it that you've never seen before

6.2.19  11:36 pm   how frustrating is it to answer many questions every day while working on videos and selling merch (i own one of your fine pieces) and also doing all of this primarily by yourself without any help?


also does that make you a madlad

     those are great questions framie, but what is your take on the matter

6.2.19  11:05 pm   how does one acquire a force field?

     take a step back, ~why~ is one acquiring the force field

6.2.19  10:57 pm   when i listen to bill wurtz music i think: "oh hell yes"

     that's kind of you

6.2.19  10:54 pm   I feel like your bass playing is criminally underrated and not talked about enough. Do you have any particular method to writing bass parts, or are they mostly improvised into the song?

     the bass isn't really a 'part', it's kind of the thing that carries all the other parts. on a skateboard, it's the board. so as long as you are carrying the person safely, you are free to go any kind of crazy outside of that that

     Depending on which of these is accurate, do you have any advice on developing that aspect of writing

     it's like driving one of those london double decker busses. you need to safely maneuver the vehicle including all the passengers, even the ones on the very top. you must also carry that weight strongly enough that you can also do kickflips with the entire bus, on occasion

6.2.19  10:52 pm   how do i find the settings on the moon it wont stop changing colors

     the settings are on the back

6.2.19  10:47 pm   How do you make original catchy melodies?

     they have to make you

6.2.19  10:36 pm   Are the timestamps of when the questions are asked or when they were answered?

     asked

      If it's when they were answered, do you sleep?

6.2.19  10:33 pm   Do you have any interest in entertaining others,

     yes

     or is it mainly just for the purpose of entertaining yourself?

     there is more to life than entertainment

6.2.19  10:32 pm   What percent fulfilled do you feel?

     62

6.2.19  10:32 pm   What do you do outside of making music and videos?

     some times i venture onto the questions page

6.2.19  10:26 pm   When did you figure out how to be yourself?

     round about the turn of the century

      Any tips?

     what other selves have you seen that you have enjoyed?

6.2.19  10:04 pm   Any chance we can see the full raw footage of you acting out the keyboard solo in La De Da?

     maybe some of it

6.2.19  9:32 pm   how do i punch the sun it hurts my eyes

     the sun has already been punched, that's the reason it now burns with rage

6.2.19  8:10 pm   I am new to the guitar, and I want to know how to translate the fret board notes to sheet music to make my own original musics.

     the staff hardly relates to the fret board, despite looking weirdly similar. your best bet is to learn the piano keyboard. if you don't want to do that but you still want to write on paper for guitar, i might recommend using TAB

6.2.19  7:46 pm   what do you think of the current month

     it's almost over

6.2.19  6:24 pm   When I was growing up my mom always played music in the house. Constantly. And we'd sing all the time. She played the piano and the guitar and she taught me to find harmonies in my mind and with my voice. Like finding a treat in your pocket.

     makes sense

6.2.19  5:55 pm   are you ever going to formally release an album, like all at the same time and stuff

     i prefer to release the songs individually, which by the way is formal

6.2.19  4:49 pm   are you dying but living at the same time

     i was going to say no but now that i think about it yes

6.2.19  3:30 pm   bill i'm currently really enjoying the keyboard break on lddddddddo @1:44, and i really appreciate the little maj 6th at the end of the solo. were you intentionally trying to avoid ending on the root there?

     no

6.2.19  2:14 pm   do you like planes?

     yes

6.2.19  1:40 pm   what genre would you categorize your music as

     post office

6.2.19  12:34 pm   What are your favourite complimentary colours?

     black and white

6.2.19  11:16 am   I'm learning guitar but I'm not sure if I want to be rhythm or lead. Since I play drums as well, I'm leaning more towards rhythm, but lead still looks intriguing. Any opinions on what I should do?

     try to figure out the exact moment that first made you want to play the guitar. then you will know what kind of guitar playing you meant to learn

6.2.19  10:25 am   I wanna do things but I get discouraged whenever I do things cuz noone sees the things I do and I put a lot of time and effort into those things, what do I do to not get discouraged and keep doing things?

     after spending a small amount of time being discouraged, then continue doing the things but do them louder maybe

6.2.19  9:08 am   what do you do to get ready when you have to succesfully do a big thing (seemingly impossible project, a concert, an interview etc.)

     more of those same things, if possible

6.2.19  8:46 am   how do i do something impossible

     do anything. everything is impossible

6.2.19  7:03 am   Is this a website

     it almost seems that way

6.2.19  6:36 am   will i ever make the right fucking choice in my life?

     yes but you won't know it until after

      also why do i care so much about what i do?

     because it's important. the reason it's important is becuase you chose to do something important, which was the right decision

6.2.19  5:19 am   how much of your videos should be consumed on a daily bases?

     that's none of my business

6.2.19  4:24 am   are you coming back soon

     i didn't leave

6.2.19  3:19 am   Do you ever reformat questions?

     no

6.2.19  2:34 am   have you ever been watching a movie and at 36 minutes and 29 seconds in, you felt a sudden urge to smash a window on the second floor of a building with your elbow?

     no

6.2.19  1:25 am   Do you think turnips are concave or convex? 

     they might actually be both

6.2.19  12:22 am   Hello. I am aware that people often ask you why you never use capital letters, as if a lack of them delegitimizes anything you write. Then you sometimes link to your enormous "capital letters report". I am not here to inspire you to do that. Instead I shall ask you this: perhaps the way you use capital letters is a bit unconventional,

     i disagree

      so what do you think is the best way to use them?

     the way i use them

6.1.19  11:19 pm   When you make a song, do you write the lyrics or the music first?

     both at the same time if possible

6.1.19  11:14 pm   what's your favorite instrument?

     baguette

6.1.19  10:29 pm   Have you found a working strategy to imagine your way back home?

     yes

      I tried, but the only place I was sent to was the nurse's office.
